source.name: Q10
source.instructions:
Given `varialbes.tf`:

```terraform
variable "region" {
  type = string
  default = "us-west-2"
}
```

And `main.tf`:

```terraform
...

provider "aws" {
  region = var.region
}

...
```

And `prod.tfvars`:

```terraform
region = "us-east-1"
```

While performing the below command:

```bash
export TF_VAR_region=eu-central-1
terraform apply -var="region=eu-north-1" -var-file=prod.tfvars
```

In which region the AWS provider would be operated?

answers.answer: The command would produce an error
